languages.text: {n}Внезапный гул привлекает ваше внимание. Словно камнепад, несущийся по склону, грохот ног и безумные вопли накрывают вас с головой. Через мгновение вы видите источник шума: толпа уродов-мутантов, несущаяся прямо на вас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}И в то же миг тяжелый рокот грозы сотрясает небеса. Все как один — хватаются за грудь, стонут, ловят ртом воздух. Вы пытаетесь устоять на ногах, но пульс бьет в виски, словно безумный барабанщик. Где-то за границами вашего сознания слышен — или чудится — нарастающий рев, дикий, нечеловеческий. Маски истошно визжат, маски кидаются прочь... оставляя вас наедине с безумием восставших мутантов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапный гул привлекает ваше внимание. Словно камнепад, несущийся по склону, грохот ног и безумные вопли накрывают вас с головой. Через мгновение вы видите источник шума: толпа уродов-мутантов, несущаяся прямо на вас!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and frantic screams overwhelm you. In a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutant freaks is charging straight at you!{/n}

{n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and frantic screams overwhelm you. In a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutant freaks is charging straight at you!{/n}

{n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and frantic screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutant freaks is charging straight at you!{/n}

{n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and frantic screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutant freaks is charging straight at you!{/n}

{n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

{n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然之间，一阵隆隆声吸引了你的注意，仿佛巨石从斜坡上不断滚落一样。无数轰鸣的脚步声与疯狂的尖叫声吞没了你。过了一会儿，你终于注意到了这场骚乱的来源——一群变种人正径直朝你冲来！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，一阵隆隆声吸引了你的注意，仿佛巨石从斜坡上不断滚落一样。无数轰鸣的脚步声与疯狂的尖叫声吞没了你。过了一会儿，你终于注意到了这场骚乱的来源——一群变种人正径直朝你冲来！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un súbito estruendo capta tu atención. Como si fuera una roca rodando montaña abajo, el fragor de innumerables pisadas y gritos coléricos te deja {mf|abrumado|abrumada}. Al cabo de unos instantes descubres el motivo de toda esa conmoción: ¡una horda de mutantes carga directamente hacia ti!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un súbito estruendo capta tu atención. Como si fuera una roca rodando montaña abajo, el fragor de innumerables pisadas y gritos coléricos te deja {mf|abrumado|abrumada}. Al cabo de unos instantes descubres el motivo de toda esa conmoción: ¡una horda de mutantes carga directamente hacia ti!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ani bir gümbürtü dikkatini çekiyor. Bir yamaçtan aşağı yuvarlanan bir kaya gibi şiddetli ayak sesleri ve çılgınca çığlıklar seni bunaltıyor. Bir an sonra kargaşanın kaynağını görüyorsun: Bir mutant grubu, doğrudan üzerine hücum ediyor!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ani bir gümbürtü dikkatini çekiyor. Bir yamaçtan aşağı yuvarlanan bir kaya gibi şiddetli ayak sesleri ve çılgınca çığlıklar seni bunaltıyor. Bir an sonra kargaşanın kaynağını görüyorsun: Bir mutant grubu, doğrudan üzerine hücum ediyor!{/n}

languages.text: {n}突然の轟音があなたの注意を引く。落石が坂道を転がるように、ドスンドスンという足音と狂ったような叫びがあなたを圧倒する。しばらくすると、その騒動の源が分かる―変異体の群れがあなたに向かって迫ってくる！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}突然の轟音があなたの注意を引く。落石が坂道を転がるように、ドスンドスンという足音と狂ったような叫びがあなたを圧倒する。しばらくすると、その騒動の源が分かる―変異体の群れがあなたに向かって迫ってくる！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un grondement soudain attire votre attention. Pareil au grondement assourdissant d'éboulis dévalant une falaise, le piétinement de dizaines de pieds assorti de hurlements rageurs vous submerge. Au bout de quelques instants, la source du vacarme apparaît devant vos yeux ébahis : une horde de mutants fonce droit sur vous !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un grondement soudain attire votre attention. Pareil au grondement assourdissant d'éboulis dévalant une falaise, le piétinement de dizaines de pieds assorti de hurlements rageurs vous submerge. Au bout de quelques instants, la source du vacarme apparaît devant vos yeux ébahis : une horde de mutants fonce droit sur vous !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich bricht Lärm aus. Wie eine Steinlawine, die einen Hang hinabrollt, überwältigen dich trampelnde Füße und wahnsinnige Schreie. Schnell erkennst du den Ursprung des Getöses: Ein Pulk von Mutanten stürmt geradewegs auf dich zu!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sudden rumble draws your attention. Like a rockfall tumbling down a slope, the thudding of feet and mad screams overwhelm you. After a moment, you see the source of the commotion: a throng of mutants is charging straight at you!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich bricht Lärm aus. Wie eine Steinlawine, die einen Hang hinabrollt, überwältigen dich trampelnde Füße und wahnsinnige Schreie. Schnell erkennst du den Ursprung des Getöses: Ein Pulk von Mutanten stürmt geradewegs auf dich zu!{/n}
